page.title: 04GAMES THE CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
The infant children play lots of games at school and they explained how to play some of their favourites.
" In 'There was a princess long ago' you make a circle and dance round and sing the song. The princess goes to sleep for a hundred years. A gallant prince wakes her up and everybody is happy at the end."
" When we sing 'Do you know the Muffin Man?' we stand in a circle. Somebody has to stand in the middle with the blind fold on. He hits someone with a roll of newspaper and then that person sings the reply. Then the person in the middle guesses who it is."
" I play 'Blind Mans Buff'. You have to be blindfolded and chase people."
